page.title: 19BUSINESS
page.content: This block has no permanent retail outlet, but there are some visiting trades.{Milk}is delivered 3 times a week from a depot in Grantham. Fresh {vegetables}are sold twice weekly from a van from Folkingham. Two{butchers visit weekly a retail pork butcher from Grantham, the other delivering mainly orders and based at Osbournby. This year for the first time {newspapers}are being delivered daily from Grantham.{Coal, calor gas and {heating oil}are delivered to order. A sub post office and small general store is at Ropsley (1.5 miles). Ropsley shop delivers orders. A mobile (Midland) bank visits Ropsley weekly. Some{small businesses}are operated from home: agricultural chemical supplies, soft furnishing sales and consultancy, glass engraving, dog breeding and stud farm.
